Assessment.QuestionText: Which of these statements about <font face="courier new">ListView</font> and <font face="courier new">TreeView</font> controls are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The <font face="courier new">Detail</font> property of <font face="courier new">ListView</font> control displays items with medium icons.
The <font face="courier new">TreeView</font> control displays data in hierarchical manner.
The <font face="courier new">ListView</font> controls supports sorting of items.
The child node of the <font face="courier new">TreeView</font> control consists of one or more child nodes and a parent node.
The <font face="courier new">ListView</font> control does not allow displaying extra information about an item.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)–(False), (B)–(True), (C)–(True), (D)–(False), and (E)-(False).
